description.raw:
Fix for [#!/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/926](#!/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/926) when the system does not have any sources.list.d file.

Failing here:

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=dart-install-pkg-debian_sid-amd64&build=46)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/dart-install-pkg-debian\_sid-amd64/46/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/dart-install-pkg-debian_sid-amd64/46/))

Solved here:

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=dart-install-pkg-debian_sid-amd64&build=47)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/dart-install-pkg-debian\_sid-amd64/47/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/dart-install-pkg-debian_sid-amd64/47/))
